name: Join Together Right Now !
description:
Description :

A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with theme "Joined Together".

Help the 2 balls come together avoiding obstacles in 3 different game modes.

You can play it alone like a real warrior, or if it's too hard find a friend and play with him !

Good luck and thanks for playing !

Controls :
KeyboardControllerLeft ball
WASD
Left stick
Right ball
Arrow keys
Right stick
Credits :

Musics (from icons8.com) :

Game by Le Brick
Game by BeatBoyNinja

Background patterns found on Subtle Patterns

All other arts and code by me.
